extendedInfo.description: The OFFICIAL app for Grand Central Terminal - and the ONLY app that seamlessly integrates real-time Metro-North train status and track updates with the definitive guide to Grand Central Terminal retail and dining. This app allows you to: â¢ Get personalized, up-to-the-minute Metro-North train updates, including train status and track information. â¢ Add a trip as a "favorite" for quick and easy access to schedules and trip info. â¢ Access exclusive offers from Grand Central Terminal retail shops, including Grand Central MarketÂ®. â¢ Get complete information on the latest Terminal events, including what's happening in Vanderbilt Hall. â¢ Explore the map and find places to eat, shop, have a cocktail, grab a snack, run an errand, and more. â¢ Explore 100 years of history of the Terminal using the interactive timeline. â¢ Discover the secrets and hidden gems of this New York City landmark.

reviews.title: Pretty but needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: Good ideas like favorite trips, but ui is simply awful in that it\'s slow, freezes, unresponsive...
reviews.author: Geir Magnusson

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Provides new information about stores and a pretty but slow train interface, but history section has only four very basic articles. I was hoping to be able to do more of a tour from this app.
reviews.author: Amanda Kennedy

reviews.title: Nice - room for improvement
reviews.comment: Nice looking app and works well. However, as majority of ppl use this for train schedules, it should have a better \"favorites\" trip list where it saves your routes and allows quick and easy access to schedules showing more than just one train. The app \"right track\" does a better job with favorites
reviews.author: Jonathan Behling

reviews.title: Beautiful but unusably SLOW
reviews.comment: Great start to the app but everything from the connectivity to the interface is slow or unresponsive.   The web service can\'t handle the load and the data is all online.  Even the interface is horribly slow to operate and is buggy after you add favorites. Needs a local database for offline use and major speed improvements.
reviews.author: Jon Eisenstein

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Nice App, love that the app tells you your track number, status, and next departure . Also love the store directory and GCT history sections.  A few comments about this app:  - When selecting a favorite, you should be able to select the entire row rather than the text to get it to switch favorites.  - The red notification triangle, pops up but there are no service alerts. - A bit sluggish, but to be honest didn\'t notice it until I read the comments below. - Widget needed - nice to have
reviews.author: Johnathon Pasley

reviews.title: To make an app this slow, you have to try pretty hard
reviews.comment: How about focus on making a functional UI instead of showing restaurants. Pretty much on par with my expectations of metro north in general....totally useless. If you\'re the CTO (or whatever title your buddies on the board gave you) and you\'re reading this...fire yourself.
reviews.author: Daniel Scalamogna

reviews.title: Very good but...
reviews.comment: I\'d like to be able to view my current trip. As soon as the train I\'m on leaves, I can\'t go back to the trip to see which track my transfer is.  Overall beautiful app, albeit a little slow.
reviews.author: Nathan Rousseau Smith

reviews.title: Need work
reviews.comment: Looks good but doesn\'t work.  Rarely loads, frequently tells me there are no trains to my stop, during rush hour and generally does not give me information needed.   Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Ann Jackson

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Love the design and the history section is so interesting! And finding places to eat and stuff is so easy to.navigate! Awesome!!!
reviews.author: Esther Park

reviews.title: Is it just me?
reviews.comment: I\'ve installed this on two separate occasions now, and still cannot get schedule information. The to-and-from station buttons simply do not respond to touch. What gives?
reviews.author: John Abell

reviews.comment: This app is great!  Love the shake and learn feature
reviews.author: Alysha Serdula

reviews.title: Slow and unusable
reviews.comment: I commute everyday to and from the city and I constantly need to check train times and tracks. This app looked promising but it\'s full of bugs and was extremely slow on my brand new HTC One. Please fix it!
reviews.author: Raul Coto Batres

reviews.title: Sluggish...
reviews.comment: ...as I would expect from the mta. Sluggish and really slow performance. Good luck getting these guys to fix it.
reviews.author: Gilbert Quinones

reviews.title: Buggy and Not Ready for Prime Time
reviews.comment: Apparently not fully tested and in dire need of repair, GCT consistently freezes, has links to objects that don\'t load, runs slowly, and doesn\'t trap errors properly.
reviews.author: Larry Scott
